about_the_game:
Abyssal Legend Supporter Pack


They say when you gaze into the abyss, the abyss gazes back. For a lucky few, they lock eyes with a power that only legends can tame. Become the Abyssal Legend.

This Pack Includes all cosmetic items from the Abyssal Traveler, Abyssal Templar, Abyssal Vanquisher supporter packs, and the following additional items:

Deep Watcher's Helm

An upgraded helmet designed for the Scourge of the Depths armor set, strike fear into the toughest of foes with the Deep Watcher's cosmetic helmet.

Orenthia's Regret

An upgraded helmet designed for the Harbingers Plate armor set, let others know that you are not to be trifled with while wearing the Orenthia's Regret cosmetic helmet.

Deep Lurker Pet

Creatures of the depths know power when they see it, and some choose to follow you. Equip the Deep Lurker pet cosmetic and have them join you on your travels.

Nihilimus Pet

Even the powers of the Void recognize the strength of the Traveler. Equip the Nihilimus cosmetic pet to join you on your quests.

Abyssal Legend In-Game Title

Your allies and foes will know fear as you display the Abyssal Legend in-game cosmetic title.

Abyssal Legend Forum Badge

You were here for 1.1, and your journey is a part of your story. Showcase your travels with the Abyssal Legend Forum Badge.

300 Total Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.


*Please note that DLC Packages are not refundable, and if you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Please check before purchasing to ensure you have not already purchased this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
